es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter
Class NextScene

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.NextScene
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasTargetId, Positioned, Cloneable
public class NextScene
extends Object
implements Cloneable, HasTargetId, Positioned

This class holds the data of a next scene in eAdventure

public String getCursorPath()
